description:
*NEW* COURSE by Melody Litton!

Say "No" to the expense and risks involved with weight loss surgery. Instead, show your body some real love by embracing this alternative and healthy option.

Hypno Stomach Shrinking and Lap Band Placement guides you in using the power of your own mind to create the positive and lasting changes you desire. Throughout your life you have likely learned to "tune out" your body signals which often leads to overeating, weight gain, and a slew of unhealthy physical conditions. This course helps to reverse this problem and works to restore your ability to "tune into" the signals your body is trying to send you; helping it to be much easier to eat less and feel completely satisfied.

With hypnosis you will work to guide your stomach back to its healthiest size and create a virtual lap band to hold and support it in staying this healthy size.

Melody takes a loving and gentle approach to this process and strives to align you with your stomach in a healthy and beautiful way in order to support your body in achieving and maintaining its healthiest weight.
title: Hypno Stomach Shrinking and Lap Band Placement
